name: Tail Current
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Wilderness © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as tailwind except it creates a helpful current in water instead of in the air. It grants free movement while swimming rather than while flying and functions only underwater.
text_zh: 这种法术如同顺风术，除了它创造的是助力水流，而非气流。它会在游泳而非飞行时提供免费移动，且只在水下起效。
